Name: Thunder Chase
About the game: Thunder Chase pits you against never ending missiles. Protected by a time slowing Armor and with various Boosts, survive as long as you can! Speed Boost Gain boost to your speed to navigate through difficult situations and avoid being swarmed by enemies! Armor After being hit, your Armor allows you to endure a few more hits without taking damage and also slows time for a while. Decoy Bomb Drop off a decoy bomb, which attracts all active missiles to itself for a while and destroys unlucky ones close to it. EMP Fire a massive blast, which destroys every enemy. They are few in number so save some for impossible situations.
